page.title: 07Law and Order
page.content: Milburn is a rural area where community policing is responsible for law and order. The local policeman lives in one of the villages in this case Kirkby Thore and is responsible for the surrounding villages.He becomes a familiar character and through friendship and interest is able to keep a watchful eye on the people. He becomes involved with the youngsters through football, road safety and youth clubs. When problems arise and cannot be dealt with immediately by this policeman they are referred to the nearest town Appleby but should dentention be necessary then the person will be transferred to Penrith.
